highlights.description: Code quality improvements and lint fixes

changed.description: Reduced duplication in MCP element handlers with `elementOp` helper function

fixed.description: Handle unchecked errors in RPA executor for browser cleanup and error handler steps
Tighten file permissions from 0644 to 0600 for security (gosec G306)
Fix gofmt formatting in RPA types

documentation.description: Add release notes for v0.2.0 and reorganize releases into `docs/releases/`
Update documentation for clicker availability and repo migration

infrastructure.description: Make E2E tests manual until clicker binary is distributed
Suppress false positive lint warnings with nolint directives

highlights.description: Go client for Vibium browser automation platform with full feature parity with JavaScript and Python clients

added.description: BiDi WebSocket client for browser communication
Clicker process management with binary discovery via `VIBIUM_CLICKER_PATH`, PATH, and cache directory
Debug logging with `slog` via `VIBIUM_DEBUG` environment variable
`FindAll()` method for finding multiple elements by CSS selector

changed.description: Environment variable renamed from `HEADLESS` to `VIBIUM_HEADLESS` for consistency

fixed.description: Format `bidi.go` with gofmt and tighten file permissions to 0600
`FindAll` parsing to handle BiDi array serialization by returning JSON from JavaScript
Relaxed test assertions for example.com content changes

tests.description: Example tests with testable examples for documentation
Integration tests for `example.com` with page title, element finding, screenshots, and JavaScript evaluation
Integration tests for `the-internet.herokuapp.com` with dynamic elements, inputs, checkboxes, dropdowns, and navigation

documentation.description: README with feature parity table, installation, quick start, and API reference
Documentation for debug logging, navigation methods, and `FindAll`
Testing section with unit and integration test instructions
Repository badges for build status, lint, Go Report Card, and license
